description: List file attachments with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Authenticated users can list file attachments they created or those attached to resources they are allowed to view; access is scoped by the attached resource policy.
validation_notes: Use --attached-to-type and --attached-to-id together to filter by attached resource. When both are set, the filter value is sent as 'id|type'.

flags.name: --attached-to-type
flags.description: Filter by attached resource type (e.g., Project)
